Name: Apple__Apple_scab
column3: Read about the Avocado leaf roller pest and the damage it does to avocados, custard apples, coffee, tea and other crops in North Queensland and learn how to control it.

Name: Apple__Black_rot
column3: Information on the Banana aphid insect pest which can spread banana bunchy top virus (BBTV) including description, distribution, hosts, damage and controls.

Name: Apple_Cedar_apple_rust
column3: Information on the Banana flower thrip insect pest, which is found throughout the banana-growing districts.

Name: Apple_healthy
column3: independently. Description Clearwing borer (Carmenta chrysophanes) insect pest in all lychee and longan growing areas in Queensland. Description, life cycle, host range, damage, control.

Name: Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_spot
column3: Citrus mealybug (Planococcus citri) is a major and frequent pest of many fruit and ornamentals throughout Australia. Description, life cycle, damage and control.

Name: Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_
column3: Diamondback moth insect pest information and control options.

Name: Corn_(maize)___healthy
column3: Information on the Eggfruit caterpillar. Eggplant is the main commercial host but it also occasionally attacks tomato, capsicum and pepino.

Name: Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight
column3: False spider mite (Brevipalpus sp.) is minor pest of a variety of fruit crops.Predatory mites control numbers but if fruit loss is high, consider treatment.

Name: Grape___Black_rot
column3: Flower eating caterpillar information and control options.

Name: Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles)
column3: Orange fruit borer (Isotenes miserana) is a minor and sporadic pest of a variety of fruit crops in coastal Queensland.Use chemical sprays when numbers indicate.

Name: Grape___healthy
column3: Red scale (Aonidiella aurantii) infests a range of hosts including citrus, passionfruit. Biological control is crucial so spray only if infestation is high.

Name: Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spot)
column3: Pink wax scale (Ceroplastes rubens) is a minor and frequent pest of many tropical fruit crops but is well managed with a range of biological controls.

Name: Potato___Early_blight
column3: Potato moth (Phthorimaea operculella) is a serious pest of tomatoes and is usually supressed by parasitoids. Avoid planting adjacent to susceptible crops.

Name: Potato___healthy

Name: Tomato___Bacterial_spot
column3: Tomato russet mite (Aculops lycopersici) affect tomato, chilli and capsicum. Maintain good farm hygiene and destroy old crops and weeds, spray when appropriate.
